title: Best of the three immediately adjacent hotels
text:
I've stayed in all three immediately adjacent hotels (Aloft, Westin, and Marriott) typically the night before a 6am flight to the East coast. Aloft is just too noisy whne they use the Oakland facing runway, the Westin has the best beds but the Westin's restaurant and bar are not as good as the excellent facilities at the Mariott and the Mariott has them all beat being situated on the waterside footpath with a pleasant forecourt looking over the water to enjoy an evening drink. My flight is usually too early to eat breakfast in the hotel but I can grab coffee in the M lounge.
Given that the hotel shuttle ride is a scant 10 mins to be at the terminal to check hotel is now my airport hotel of choice.
Also if you do stay here consider eating at the amazing New England Lobster Market on Cowan Rd opposite the hotel.
